name: Cyber Jump (rhueckel)
description:
Anita Gunn wakes up in a strange digital world where she is greeted by a talking cat in a mech - who informs her of dangerous viruses that infect the cyber-space. Before she has time for questions, the cat challenges her to a test of her fighting skills! In order to prove herself, she'll need to defeat the cat and his mech in multiple dimensions - experience these as a thrilling shooter boss fight that shifts from top-down pixel art to full 3D!

Controls:

  • WASD for movement
  • Left click to fire
  • Right click to secondary fire (Only in 3D)
  • Space to jump (Only in 3D)
